projects.author: Daniel Butler
projects.title: Multi-Payable Importer
projects.description: Revolutionize Your Accounts Payable Process with Multipayable Importer - Save 8+ Hours Monthly! This developer created a game-changing tool that allows the Accounts Payable team to enter hundreds of lines for 70+ invoices or credit memos at a time, saving hours of manual entry. With the ability to generate required expensing journal entries and easily track payables in the accounting system, this tool improves workflow consistency and accuracy during critical times like Month End, Audit, and Tax preparation. Plus, with Vuetify's Material Design and a separate background process for long running tasks, this tool offers a rich responsive user experience. Learn how this developer overcame the challenge of long running tasks to create a valuable MVP.

projects.author: Daniel Butler
projects.title: Receipt Capture
projects.description: Revolutionizing Expense Management: See how one developer tackled a corrupt receipt issue and created a reliable solution in just one month! Learn about the value of testing, going to production, and communication skills that made this project a success for the entire company. Say goodbye to lost receipts and hello to faster reimbursements with this groundbreaking web application!
